Content:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}}
{\colortbl ;\red255\green255\blue0;}
{\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 
\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 article 51 p.5\par
\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 >>> 20-02-2021 23:00\par
\f1\lang1049\'c2\'e7\'ff\'f2\'fc \'ef\'f0\'ee\'f1\'f2\'ee \'ee\'e4\'e8\'ed \'e8\'eb\'e8 \'e4\'e2\'e0 \'e0\'e1\'e7\'e0\'f2\'f6\'e0 \'e8 \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'eb\'ee\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e5 \'e7\'e0 \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'eb\'ee\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e5\'ec \'ef\'f0\'ee\'f0\'e0\'e1\'e0\'f2\'fb\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ed\'e8\'e6\'e5 \'f1\'eb\'e5\'e4\'f3\'fe\'f9\'e8\'ec \'ee\'e1\'f0\'e0\'e7\'ee\'ec.\f0\lang1033\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\'d7\'f2\'ee \'ef\'ee\'ec\'ee\'e3\'e0\'eb\'ee \'c8\'ee\'f1\'e8\'f4\'f3 \'e1\'ee\'f0\'ee\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'f1 \'f3\'ed\'fb\'ed\'e8\'e5\'ec?\par
How did Joseph overcome discouragement?\par
\f0\lang1033 overcome - \f1\lang1049\'ef\'f0\'e5\'e2\'ee\'f1\'f5\'ee\'e4\'e8\'f2\'fc \'ef\'f0\'e5\'ee\'e4\'ee\'eb\'e5\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ef\'ee\'e1\'ee\'f0\'ee\'f2\'fc\par
\f0\lang1033\par
\f1\lang1049\'ca\'ee\'e3\'e4\'e0 \'c8\'ee\'f1\'e8\'f4 \'e1\'fb\'eb \'f0\'e0\'e1\'ee\'ec, \'e0 \'ef\'ee\'e7\'e4\'ed\'e5\'e5 \'f1\'e8\'e4\'e5\'eb \'e2 \'f2\'fe\'f0\'fc\'ec\'e5, \'ee\'ed \'ed\'e8\'f7\'e5\'e3\'ee \'ed\'e5 \'ec\'ee\'e3 \'e8\'e7\'ec\'e5\'ed\'e8\'f2\'fc\f0\lang1033 .\par
When Joseph was a slave, and some time later he was thrown into a prison, he could not affect his circumstances.\par
While a slave and later in prison, Joseph had limited options and freedom of movement.\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\'d7\'f2\'ee \'e6\'e5 \'ef\'ee\'ec\'ee\'e3\'eb\'ee \'e5\'ec\'f3 \'ed\'e5 \'e2\'ef\'e0\'f1\'f2\'fc \'e2 \'ee\'f2\'f7\'e0\'ff\'ed\'e8\'e5?\par
\f0\lang1033 my> What thing did help him to not being discouraged?\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 yandex> What helped him not to get discouraged?\par
orig> How did he keep his balance?\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033\par
\f1\lang1049\'ce\'ed \'e4\'f3\'ec\'e0\'eb \'ed\'e5 \'ee \'f2\'ee\'ec, \'f7\'e5\'e3\'ee \'f3\'e6\'e5 \'ed\'e5 \'e2 \'f1\'ee\'f1\'f2\'ee\'ff\'ed\'e8\'e8 \'e1\'fb\'eb \'e4\'e5\'eb\'e0\'f2\'fc, \'e0 \'ee \'f2\'ee\'ec, \'f7\'f2\'ee \'e4\'e5\'eb\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ec\'ee\'e3, \'e8 \'f1\'f2\'e0\'f0\'e0\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee \'e2\'fb\'ef\'ee\'eb\'ed\'ff\'eb \'ef\'ee\'f0\'f3\'f7\'e5\'ed\'ed\'f3\'fe \'f0\'e0\'e1\'ee\'f2\'f3\f0\lang1033 .\par
my> He did not focus on his terrible circumstances, instead he worked hard he could (did his best).\par
yandex> He ignored his dire circumstances, instead he worked hard as he could.\par
orig> Instead of focusing on what he was no longer able to do, he diligently applied himself to the work he was assigned to do.\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 diligently - \f1\lang1049\'f1\'f2\'e0\'f0\'e0\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee \'f3\'f1\'e5\'f0\'e4\'ed\'ee \'ef\'f0\'e8\'eb\'e5\'e6\'ed\'ee\par
\par
\'cd\'ee, \'f7\'f2\'ee \'e2\'e0\'e6\'ed\'e5\'e5 \'e2\'f1\'e5\'e3\'ee, \'c8\'ee\'f1\'e8\'f4 \'f1\'f2\'e0\'f0\'e0\'eb\'f1\'ff, \'f7\'f2\'ee\'e1\'fb \'f6\'e5\'ed\'f2\'f0\'e0\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee\'e5 \'ec\'e5\'f1\'f2\'ee \'e2 \'e5\'e3\'ee \'e6\'e8\'e7\'ed\'e8 \'e7\'e0\'ed\'e8\'ec\'e0\'eb \'c8\'e5\'e3\'ee\'e2\'e0.\par
\f0\lang1033 me> Most of all, Joseph put relationship with Jehovah the most important in his life.\par
yandex> Most of all, Joseph considered his relationship with Jehovah to be the most important thing in his life.\par
orig> Most of all, Joseph kept Jehovah as the most important Person in his life.\f1\lang1049\par
\par
\'c0 \'c8\'e5\'e3\'ee\'e2\'e0, \'e2 \'f1\'e2\'ee\'fe \'ee\'f7\'e5\'f0\'e5\'e4\'fc, \'e1\'eb\'e0\'e3\'ee\'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'eb\'ff\'eb \'e2\'f1\'e5, \'f7\'f2\'ee \'f2\'ee\'f2 \'e4\'e5\'eb\'e0\'eb\f0\lang1033 .\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 me> Jehovah, in turn, blessed everything he did.\par
yandex> -\par
orig> In turn, Jehovah blessed everything Joseph did.\f1\lang1049\par
\par
\f0\lang1033 ============\par
diligent\par
\f1\lang1049 he diligently applied himself to the work \f0\lang1033 | \f1\lang1049 he was assigned to do\par
apply yourself to do something\par
\par
\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}}

\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 In turn, we, children must take care of our old parents. (elderly parents)\par
in turn we, children, have to care on of our elderly parents.\par
\par
take care of\par
care for\par
\par
my> while children, we can not take care.\par
my> while being children, we can not provide provision for ourselves.\par
yandex> as children, we can't provide for ourselves.\par
\par
my> Most of all, we should go out to the hospital tomorrow at nine am.\par
ydx> And most importantly, we have to go to the hospital tomorrow at nine in the morning.\par
\par
All of us have to apply ourselves to fulfill Jehovah's will.\par
yandex> We must all make an effort to do Jehovah's will.\par
\par
\par
}
